snippet.title: The (FORMERLY) Fast Times Of the (SOON-TO-BE) Bachelor (MULTI) Billionaire
snippet.description: Elon Musk conjures a lot of reactions: Some know him as the technical genius behind PayPal, Tesla, and SpaceX. Others, as the real-life inspiration for Iron Man. Still others, as an L.A. playboy. The truth is all of those things but in shades far more complex than meet the eye. read »

snippet.title: At Home With Elon Musk: The (Soon-to-Be) Bachelor Billionaire
snippet.description: Some know him as the technical genius behind PayPal and SpaceX. Others, as the real-life playboy inspiration for Iron Man. The truth is both--and more.

snippet.title: 20 Tips On Increasing Your Facebook Privacy And Security
snippet.description: Let's face it, we all have an embarrassing photo that we don't want people to see on Facebook. Maintaining privacy on Facebook is important because recruiters, teachers, bosses and college admission committees are highly likely to look at your profile and make judgments about your professionalism based on what they can see. [...] read »

snippet.title: North Carolina Posts Job Listing for Football Head Coach: What's the Real Job Description?
snippet.description: Image via Wikipedia By Randy Chambers, Bleacher Report Are you currently unemployed? Have you been filling out job applications nearly every waking moment and still, for whatever reason, nobody ever calls you back? Look no further, because I have the job for you. It's called becoming the head football coach of the North Carolina [...] read »

snippet.title: Foxwoods Casino: The Glory Days
snippet.description: Foxwoods Resort & Casino (Photo credit: bradb47) Just about 20 years ago a then-leaflet of a magazine called The Improper Bostonian sent me down to a place called "Foxwoods Casino" that had popped up in the tree-infested, cultural void that fills the gap between Boston and New York (note to the [...] read »

snippet.title: Tucker Max Gives Up the Game: What Happens When a Bestselling Player Stops Playing?
snippet.description: If you’ve been anywhere near an airport bookstore in the last five years, you’ve probably seen the face of Tucker Max leering out at you from one of his two uber-bestselling books. On the cover of the New York Times-bestselling I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell, he displays the perfect [...] read »

snippet.title: A Whole Lotta Borgata
snippet.description: The new Vegas-style Borgata casino is the first upscale resort to open in Atlantic City. Will it be enough to bring profits back to the boardwalk? read »
